English: What is your favorite type of music?
French: Quel est ton genre de musique préféré ?

English: I love going to the opera.
The museum has a beautiful collection of paintings.
French: Le musée a une collection magnifique de tableaux.

English: He is an artist who paints landscapes.
French: Il est un artiste qui peint des paysages.

English: She plays the guitar very well.
French: Elle joue bien de la guitare.
